content:
I am trying to build the following dockerfile for the https://github.com/soimort/you-get.git repository. It should install any necessary dependencies and then run tests to confirm that installation succeeded:
# Use the official Python image from the Docker Hub
FROM python:3.9

# Set the working directory in the container
WORKDIR /app

# Copy the entire repository to the working directory
COPY . /app/

# Install the necessary runtime dependencies
RUN pip install --no-cache-dir -r requirements.txt

# Run the tests to verify the installation
RUN make test
